food_key3: Assigning the kitchen and cleaning duties equally and impartially among the community members
food_key4: Deciding the time for the meal breaks
food_key5: Making sure that food is being served during the break time
food_key6: Creating the menu with the help of the members who have kitchen duty
food_key7: Assigning duties for planning and buying of groceries and other raw material for food
food_key8: Addressing and resolve any complaints and grievances raised by the members regarding food
food_key9: Any other kitchen and food related issue will be solved by the food and hygiene  committee
food_key10: Documenting all such decisions on the appropriate communication channel
